column4: i have gnome-system-monitor on, if i change a setting in vmware server, memory usage of gnome-system-monitor reports that the memory use of xchat and gnome-system-monitor goes to 4gigabytes and my system hangs for a long time while it pages something
can anyone help me figure out why i cant log on with an xgl session but can with GNOME default after i tried to configure ATI dual head? thanks
